text:
A man and a woman, both rag pickers, were charred to death as the hut they were staying went up in flames near Thiruvalam on Friday.

Passersby found the hut reduced to ashes on Friday morning and they also found the charred bodies. Thiruvalam police found the women’s name to be Lalitha (60) of Keel Minnal village. As her husband had died she was living with the man and leading a nomadic life. Name and details of the man is yet to be known. Embers from the fire twigs that they used to cook might have caused the fire, police suspect. A case has been registered.

— Staff Reporter
title: Man, woman charred to death
